General Maintenance Request
---------------------------

[Sign in to Save Progress](https://hamiltontexas.com/FormCenter/Concerns-5/General-Maintenance-Request-45)



This form has been modified since it was saved. Please review all fields before submitting.

2. The City of Hamilton **General Maintenance Request Form** will help us identify a problem in your area -- and fix it fast. Should a problem require urgent attention, please call us immediately. For a police emergency, dial 911. 

   Thank you for your assistance!
4. Contact Information
6. First Name\*
7. Last Name\*
9. Address1\*
11. Address2
13. City\*
14. State\*
15. Zip\*
17. Phone Number\*
18. Email Address\*
20. Please indicate the nature of your problem by checking the appropriate box(es) below:
22. 1. Pothole
    2. Traffic signals
    3. Weeds
    4. Dogs off leash
    5. Abandoned vehicles
    6. Chemical discharge
    7. Water leaking
    1. Litter
    2. ADA Complaint
    3. Blocked drainage channel
    4. Street Lights
    5. Traffic/Road signs
    6. Overhanging trees/shrubs
    7. Noise nuisance
    1. Hazardous parking
    2. Storm sewer leaking/blockage
    3. Water leaking on roadway
    4. Loose/protruding manhole cover
    5. Discrimination Complaint
    6. Fair Housing Complaint
24. Brief Description (or other problem not listed)\*
26. Location of Problem

Leave This Blank:

28. 1. Receive an email copy of this form.
29. Email address

    This field is not part of the form submission.
